attributes.action: Do not scrap child benefit for all higher tax payers in 2013
attributes.additional_details: Do not scrap child benefit for all higher rate tax payers in 2013. With the current pay freezes/cuts, high inflation, recent VAT increase and the general squeeze on household incomes, this will have a significant negative impact on young families who are already paying for the failures of the banking sector and the excesses of previous generations. A minimum household joint income should be used and I would suggest this is set at £100,000.
